text:
@BarackObama Funny 
The same gun toting, FEAR and HATRED spewing, lonely minority white men without masks screaming let me get coronavirus ...
can’t stand seeing the majority black men they’ve tried to suppress and belittle for years. 
They attacked you only because you’re black. RACIST PIGS
